oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Western Music Spectacular at the University of Dayton Arena
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country music festivals; The Wilburn Brothers; Smith, Connie, 1941-; Reeves, Del; Snow, Hank; Stoneman Family (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a Country Music Spectacular with the Wilburn Brothers, Connie Smith, Del Reeves, Hank Snow, the Stonemans, Jim Hurley, the Kendall's, Peggy Sue, J. Lee Webb, Carl Phillips and Sonny Wright at the University of Dayton Arena on October 17. Poster features metal photoplates of Wilburn Brothers, Connie Smith, Del Reeves, Hank Snow and the Stonemans.
